item.title: Installing Portainer on an ESXi VM
item.description: Installing vShpere 8.0 The first thing we’re going to do is create a vSphere VM. I’m using VMware Workstation Pro, but you should be able to use any other hypervisor like VirtualBox or Hyper-V. Make sure you’re giving the VM ample RAM and CPU cores. ESXi requires at least 8 GBs of RAM and two CPU cores. My laptop I’m running this on has 16 GBs of RAM, so I’ll give the VM half of that.
